attributes.action: Life imprisonment punishment for any person who profits from the legal or illegal sale of weaponry of mass destruction used in wars or civil battles.
attributes.additional_details:
Life imprisonment punishment for any person who profits from the legal or illegal sale of weaponry of mass destruction used in wars or civil battles.

1)   Incite war/civil battles with intent to create a buyer’s market in order to sell weaponry of mass destruction (especially in a sustained fashion) punishable by life imprisonment.
2)   To use government tax funds in order support those who profit from making of weaponry, punishable by life imprisonment.
3)   To supply weaponry to for profit punishable by life imprisonment
4)   To profit from sale of weaponry, punishable by life imprisonment
